import React from 'react' import '../App.css' import { Navbar, Nav, NavItem, Container, Dropdown, DropdownButton, Button, } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' class Header extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { isLogged: false, } } async handleClick() { // Đoạn này xử lý code // đặt tạm đoạn này let account = true if (account) { this.setState({ isLogged: true }) } } render() { console.log('status' ) console.log(this.props.status) return ( <>
{!this.state.isLogged ? ( <> ) : ( this.logOut()} > Logout )}
) } } export default Header
